Class VanillaCompat

java.lang.Object
com.Ev0sMods.Ev0sChisel.compat.VanillaCompat
public final class VanillaCompat extends Object
Injects Chisel.Data onto vanilla Hytale blocks that belong to rock, soil, or wood families but do not yet have chisel state data.

This runs after MasonryCompat, CarpentryCompat, MacawCompat, and StoneworksCompat so that any blocks already handled by those passes are skipped (the guard if (existing instanceof Chisel.Data) continue; prevents double-injection).

All block keys are probed via BlockType.fromString(String) at runtime; nothing is injected for keys that do not exist in the asset pack.

Vanilla-only support: This compat layer works independently of other mods. When MasonryCompat or CarpentryCompat are not available, VanillaCompat will discover and inject chisel states for vanilla rock/wood blocks directly.

  • Method Details

    • getRockTypes

      public static String[] getRockTypes()
      Returns the rock types array for external use. This allows VanillaCompat to work as a fallback when MasonryCompat is not available.

    • getWoodTypes

      public static String[] getWoodTypes()
      Returns the wood types array for external use. This allows VanillaCompat to work as a fallback when CarpentryCompat is not available.

    • injectChiselStates

      public static void injectChiselStates()
      Probes the runtime asset registry and injects Chisel.Data onto any discovered vanilla rock, soil, or wood block that does not already carry chisel state data.

      Must be called from Ev0sChiselPlugin.start() after all other compat passes.

    • deriveExistingWoodRoofing

      public static String[] deriveExistingWoodRoofing(String[] bases)
      Derives wood roofing by probing both standard _Roof* and wood-specific _Shingle* suffixes against each base key. Public so the UI layer can use it as a fallback derivation.
